title: Blizzard Cancels Starcraft FPS - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.07.19
description:
Start your trial month for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Get 74% off the Father's Day Steak fix gift package at http://omahasteaks.com and enter code: KFGAMES in the search bar.

Fran and Gamespot's Mike Mahardy talk about Blizzard cancelling their Starcraft FPS,  the new Ninja Theory game, and THQNordic's 3rd E3 announcement!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:21 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny Games E3 Showcase - Monday, June 10th @ 4:30 p.m. PT 60+ indie games. youtube.com/kindfunnygames
E3 is upon us and Kinda Funny is doing all kinds of coverage! Check @KindaFunnyVids pinned tweet to see our E3 schedule! Because of that there is no Games Daily or regular Gamescast next week!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:13 - Blizzard Cancels Starcraft FPS That Was In Development for 2 Years
00:14:45 - Take-Two CEO Says There Is "No Downside" To Releasing Red Dead Redemption 2 On PC
00:20:55 - Yooka-Laylee: The Impossible Lair Announced
00:24:20 - Destroy All Humans Remake Announced
00:27:13 - Assassin’s Creed Odyssey Community Tool Will Allegedly Be Announced At E3
00:31:42 - Ninja Theory’s next game, Bleeding Edge, appears to have leaked ahead of E3
00:37:26 - Destiny 2 Free-to-Expand and New Expansion - RECAP
00:48:17 - Out today
00:49:29 -  Hims
00:50:47 - Omaha Steaks
00:53:30 - Deals of the Day
Reader mail   -
00:54:12 - “Between pre-E3 streams and twitter posts I feel there might not be a lot of surprises this year at E3” - Borzen00
00:56:23 - “Do you think we’re just leaving the console wars behind in exchange for the streaming service wars?” - Lexus
01:02:05 - Squad Up: Alfonso - Xbox - SpeaksBeliefs - Division 2 Raid Clan
01:02:53 - You‘re Wrong
